item.title: All array method in Javascript
item.author: Haolin Yang
item.description: Show all function: Try Array.prototype & Array in browser console. foreach let numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; // each element in a func numbers.forEach((element, index, arr) => { console.log(`a[${index}] = ${element}`); }); // a[0] = 1 // a[1] = 2 // a[2] = 3 // a[3] = 4 // a[4] = 5 map let numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; // [] => [] (some size) let numbers2 = numbers.
